channel.title: Max hit of range weapons
channel.description: how do you change the max hit of a range weapon as i have a d'cbow which currently hits less than a rune c'bow anyone know how to change it without raising the bonuses it gives cause ive tryed that :confused: some one must know =[

item.title: Max hit of range weapons

item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Read the date before posting next time.

item.title: Max hit of range weapons
item.dc:creator: @Aeiro Aeiro
item.description:
@Aeiro wrote:

First open client.java and search for this :

public int maxRangeHit()

Now scroll down a lil bit and u should see this :

    if(hasCrystalBow())
    {
        d *= 1.5D;
    } else
    if(!hasCrystalBow() && (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 882 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 883))
    {
        d *= 1.042D;
    } else

Now like for an example we wantto change the rune crossbow hit to make it hit harder
So scroll down till u see this :

    if(!hasCrystalBow() && (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837))

Because 837 is the item id fo rune crossbow

Now to change the hit u will have just to change this :

d *= 2.9D;

To make it hit higher make it like :

d*= 3.0D

U can change the number, dont make it to high or u will hit 100+ with
crossbow

Thanks for reading this tutorial, i hope i helped u.

Read full topic
